full_summary:
====================================

### Invitation to Bid: 16-inch MacBook Pro for Canada Revenue Agency

**Solicitation Number:** SSC-24-00026237:T
**Reference Number:** BPM021263/26237

### Background
--------------------------------

The Canada Revenue Agency is seeking a bidder to supply and deliver ten (10) 16-inch MacBook Pro (Z1CM or equivalent) for use by the Agency's employees. The Equipment shall be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario, within 30 working days from the contract award date.

### Terms and Conditions
-------------------------

*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement of this nature.
*   Award of the contract will be based on the lowest evaluated price of the responsive bid.
*   Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
*   Inquiries related to this solicitation must be directed to the Procurement Officer in writing.

### Tender Details
-------------------

*   **Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**: SSC-24-00026237:T
*   **Publication Date**: April 2, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: April 17, 2024 at 14:00:00
*   **Solicitation Type**: Competitive – Open Bidding

### Evaluation Criteria
-------------------------

The evaluation of bids will be based on the lowest evaluated price.

### Documents
--------------

Access to the Solicitation and bid submission package is available online at [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login).
The Contractor Contact Information:
-----------------------------------

Sebastien Darif
Procurement Officer
Shared Services Canada
99 Metcalfe Street, 11th Floor
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 1E3
Telephone: (613) 866-5465
Email: Sebastienmajd.darif@ssc-spc.gc.ca
Attachments: the solicitation bulletin and other documents are available at the link above. Amendments can be found at [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/usr/login). 

 (status)
======================================

The tender was closed and is no longer accepting new bids (status changed)
